physDesc.p: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 42 x 57, (A) 6 lines, right margin, (B) 3 lines, bottom margin, (2) 58 x 45, (A) 5 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (3) 57 x 18, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (4) 65 x 39, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (5) 55 x 45, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 27 x 21, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 22 x 18, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 63 x 33, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 50 x 23, (A) 5 lines, left margin, (B) 2 lines, right margin, (10) 31 x 24, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margin, (11) 41 x 35, (A) 5 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (12) 90 x 34, (A) 12 lines (?), left margin, (B) traces of 5 lines, (13) 86 x 36, (A) 6 lines, left bottom margin, (B) blank, (14) 67 x 50, (A) 2 col., col. i: 3 lines, col. ii: 6 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (15) 103 x 39, (A) 4 lines (?), left margin, (B) traces, (16) 81 x 17, (A) 7 lines, bottom margin, (B) blank, (17) 102 x 22, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank
